name: Prangya Paramita Pati
greetingText: There's something about you that's unforgettable!
wishText: Wishing you a year filled with endless learning and joyful moments!

textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to an amazing soul! Here's to many happy returns!
text2: I thought I'd give you the cutest thing in the world...
text3: But then I realized you are super cute yourself!
text5Content: You light up every room you enter with your beautiful smile and energy.
outroText: Hope you enjoyed this surprise LOVE from MARIO.
